name: WebNavigationType
desc: Possible values for the WebActionNavigationTypeKey key that appears in an action dictionary.

items.name: case backForward
items.desc: The user clicked back or forward button.

items.name: case reload
items.desc: The user hit the reload button.

items.name: case formResubmitted
items.desc: A form was resubmitted (through a back, forward or reload action).

items.name: case other
items.desc: Navigation is taking place for some other reason.
